contentrichtext.text: '''Cosamaloapan''' is a municipality located in the plains of the Sotavento zone in the central zone of the State of [[Veracruz (state)|Veracruz]], about 240 km from state capital [[Xalapa]]. It has a surface of 323.26 km2. It is located at {{coord|18|22|N|95|48|W|}}. The poet [[Manuel Carpio]] was born in Cosamaloapan. Cosamaloapan serves as the municipal seat of the municipality of '''Cosamaloapan de Carpio''', which was so renamed in honour of its most famous son in 1918. ==Geographic Limits== [[File:Rio Papaloapan Cosamaloapan.JPG|thumb|300px|Papaloapan river in front of Cosamaloapan city]] The municipality of '''Cosamaloapan''' is delimited to the north by [[Tierra Blanca, Veracruz|Tierra Blanca]] and [[Ixmatlahuacan]] to the south by [[Chacaltianguis]] and [[Tuxtilla]] to the east by [[Carlos A. Carrillo, Veracruz|Carlos A. Carrillo]] and to the west by [[Tres Valles]].<ref name="e-local">{{cite web|url= http://www.e-local.gob.mx/work/templates/enciclo/veracruz/municipios/30045a.htm |title=Enciclopedia de los Municipios de México: Cosamaloapan |publisher=[http://www.veracruz.gob.mx Gobierno Estatal]|language=[[Spanish language|Spanish]]|accessdate=2009-06-12}}</ref> It is watered by small creeks of the river Papaloapan. ==Agriculture== It produces principally [[maize]], [[beans]], [[sugarcane]], [[watermelon]] and [[green chile]]. ==Celebrations== [[File:COS Parque Central 01.JPG|thumb|300px|right|Marcos Carrillo Herrera Park]] In ''' Cosamaloapan''', in May takes place the celebration in honor of the Virgen de la Concepción, Patron of the town, and in December takes place the celebration in honor of the Virgen de Guadalupe. ==Weather== The weather in '''Cosamaloapan''' is warm and wet all year with rains in summer and autumn. ==References== {{reflist|1}} == External links == * {{es icon}} [http://www.cosamaloapan.gob.mx Municipal Official webpage] * {{es icon}} [http://portal.veracruz.gob.mx/portal/page?_pageid=153,4493464&_dad=portal&_schema=PORTAL&municipio=cosamaloapan.pdf Municipal Official Information] {{coord|18|22|N|95|48|W|source:enwiki-plaintext-parser|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in Veracruz]] {{Veracruz-geo-stub}}
